entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
